amendment.description: To modify the eligibility requirements for trade adjustment assistance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 642, under the order of 9/21/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 57. Record Vote Number: 144.

action.text: Amendment SA 642 proposed by Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 633. (consideration: CR S5810-5816, S5827-5828; text: CR S5810) To modify the eligibility requirements for trade adjustment assistance.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 642, under the order of 9/21/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 57. Record Vote Number: 144.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 642, under the order of 9/21/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 57. Record Vote Number: 144.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 642 proposed by Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 633.
